text: Charlotte Stevens (1902–1946) was an American film actress of the silent era playing a mixture of lead and supporting roles.Munden p.506 ==Selected filmography== * The Mirage (1924) * One Law for the Woman (1924) * Flying Hoofs (1925) * With Kit Carson Over the Great Divide (1925) * The Heart of a Coward (1926) * The Cancelled Debt (1927) * The Coward (1927) * Thunder Riders (1928) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1902 births Category:1946 deaths Category:American film actresses Category:Actresses from Chicago Category:20th-century American actresses Category:American silent film actresses
title: Charlotte Stevens
